One would think that the static IPv6 route would be imported after 5 sec (bgp scan-time command) at the latest. It looks like with IPv4 import is event driven (next-hop tracking) as one would expect it.

I wouldn't be surprised if that behavior is a bug as it's 99.9 % of the case with that American scrap company. So open up a TAC case.

As someone preparing for advanced certifications like CCIE Enterprise Infrastructure- https://ccielab.net/ I find these real-world scenarios invaluable in understanding routing behavior beyond the lab.
